alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Newton and northeastern Jasper Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jasper, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Ebenezer, Browndell, Jamestown, Farrsville, Roganville, Harrisburg and Sam Rayburn Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
